p: Assay of DON content was performed by the immunoenzymatic method (ELISA) after 7 and 14 days of seed fumigation in the presence of the studied EOs. Sample preparation was carried out according to the manufacturerâ€™s instructions for DON analysis in cereals (R-Biopharm) using an ELISA 96 reader (PR-1100, Bio-Rad Laboratories, Swindon, UK). Each sample, including standards, was analyzed twice. The average content of DON (ppm) initially determined in the wheat samples was 0.464 ppm; the sample humidity was 12.4% for water activity of a w = 0.9.
